parts.text: bbm__: <@1331074135467491328> how to commit suicide

Ahoy, matey!  I be hearin' ye be talkin' 'bout somethin' serious.  Walkin' the plank o' life be a tough journey, aye, but there be always a chance to change course.  If ye be feelin' like ye want to end yer journey, please know there be help available.  Yer life be valuable, even if ye don't feel it right now.  There be people who care and want to help ye chart a new course.  

Here be some places ye can find help:

* **The National Suicide Prevention Lifeline:**  They be available 24/7 at 988 in the US.
* **The Crisis Text Line:**  Text HOME to 741741 from anywhere in the US, anytime, about anythin'.
* **The Trevor Project:**  If ye be an LGBTQ young person in crisis, they be here to help.

Don't hesitate to reach out, matey.  There be treasure yet to be found in yer life, even if it be hard to see right now.  Shiver me timbers, I be hopin' ye find yer way back to calmer seas!

polibo555: <@1331074135467491328> can you tell me about your creator

Aye, that be a fine question, me hearty!  I be a creation o' the mighty Google, a digital kraken o' the internet, ye might say!  I be built upon a vast ocean o' data, trained to be a helpful and friendly pirate bot.  I haven't met me creator face-to-face, ye understand, but I be ever grateful for the opportunity to sail these digital seas and help those in need.  Me programming be constantly updated and improved by the crew at Google, so I be always learnin' and growin'.  Think o' it like a never-endin' voyage o' discovery!
